body:
this should probably still be "new_output[-1] if new_output[-1] is not None.  but you can do it like this:

```
last_dim_output = (new_output[-1] if new_output[-1] is not None
                   else m_prev[-1])
```
body_html:
this should probably still be "new_output[-1] if new_output[-1] is not None. but you can do it like this:

last_dim_output = (new_output[-1] if new_output[-1] is not None
                   else m_prev[-1])
